credit_line: Commissioned by Addison Ballard and other members of Williams College
title: Portrait of Ebenezer Kellogg (1789-1846), Williams College Professor 1815-1844 and Librarian 1815-1845
inscriptions: verso in white paint: Professor Kellogg./ Painted by Evans of Pittsfield,Mass.  August 1842:--/ By order of Addison Ballard and other members of/ Williams College./ restored and cradled by J.E.McALPINE  Holliston,Mass.1930; verso u.c. stamped on original frame: [illegible?] Brothers, Troy, NY
